description: This file contains unit tests for the AppGateway components, including ResolutionStore, Resolver, and RequestRouter. It tests overlay functionality, error handling, and request dispatching, making it integral for verifying the behavior of the AppGateway implementation.

classes.name: ResolutionStore
classes.description: A class used to overlay and resolve device configurations based on JSON objects.

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: A class responsible for loading JSON resolution overlays from file paths and retrieving resolution data.

classes.name: RequestRouter
classes.description: A class responsible for routing requests and dispatching them based on resolved configurations.

methods.name: int test_resolution_store_overlay()
methods.description: Test the overlay functionality of ResolutionStore to ensure last-wins behavior.

methods.name: int test_resolver_invalid_path()
methods.description: Test Resolver loading with an invalid file path, expecting a failure.

methods.name: int test_resolver_valid_overlay()
methods.description: Test Resolver loading from a valid overlay JSON file and retrieving correct resolution data.

methods.name: int test_request_router_echo()
methods.description: Test RequestRouter's ability to dispatch a resolved request and return expected echo responses.
